text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.

title: Data from Experiment 3 in sundh2023UnifiedExplanationVariability;textualsamplr — sundh2023e3
text: Participants made probability judgments format: “probability weather [X] random day England?". Various weather events used, queries included marginal events, conditional events, conjunctions, disjunctions. total set 20 unique queries formed block within presentation order randomized participant. experiment consisted three blocks, participants responded unique query three times.
